CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Flag__c , 'Information') , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__Note_Flags/Information.png", 'Information', 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Flag__c , 'Warning') , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__Note_Flags/Warning.png", 'Warning', 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Flag__c , 'Critical'), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__Note_Flags/Critical.png", 'Critical', 25, 25), '')))
CustomField.label: Flag Icon
